entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
